item.title: Rule 7
item.description: I keep Sister Corita Kent’s 10 Art Department Rules on my personal workspace wall. It’s also the wallpaper I have on my Mac Desktop. If you need the reminder to “do the work,” whatever that means to you, you can download one of the wallpapers below:
